page.title: 13INTERESTING BUILDINGS 2.
page.content: Being a busy market town,Uckfield has needed good transport.The railway line and station,opened in 1858 signed the death warrant of the{Ouse {Navigation Canal}which transported coal, lime, cement and chalk inland to Shortbridge Wharf and returned bricks, tiles,hops,hazel hoops(for barrel making),cotton from Hempstead and paper from Isfield Mills back to Newhaven between 1790 and 1868. {The Piltdown Man}public house and monument mark a famous local spot.It was claimed that the remains of a prehistoric skull was unearthed near the golf club.The fantastic age claimed for it was disproved by modern tests but the pride of local folk in this hoax still exists. Our{picture house}exterior has been carefully preserved since 1916 and is the oldest family run cinema around.
